name: Black Cauldron AGI - 30th anniversary - KQ 1 tweak
name_original: Black Cauldron AGI - 30th anniversary - KQ 1 tweak
description:
30th anniversary Mod of Black Cauldron AGI 1987.
I always wanted a Kings quest tweak (KQ1+2 30th this year) mod of this game with tweaks to the plot and characters to allow another reason to play through this engaging game.
First attempt at AGI Studio, Piceditor.
Run through NAGI interpretor - Excellent program.
